name: CYPEST
description:
CYPEST is an arcade / skill game. As a virus you are hacking into different servers. You try to avoid the defense systems to reach the end of the level.

Really cool: you can compare the points you've scored against all around the world and see the rankings for your continent, your region (for example Western Europe) or your country.

[Browser Version]

Changelog

1.2.1 - 2018-05-06 

* major bug inside the highscores menu fixed 
* new music for the cracktro 

1.2.0 - 2018-04-15 

* the first version which runs inside your web browser! 
* guest mode for browser and desktop version 
* c1a-mission with 12 brand new levels 
* teleporter 
* new enemy type (rotating line) 
* neue level backgrounds (for M2) 
* new item graphics (for M2) 
* new wall colors (for M2) 
* new info signs (for M2) 
* new graphics for the virus 
* new images for the manual 
* a texture for wall overlay 
* rectangle for level selections 
* "loading" performance for all levels improved 
* performance of database operations improved 
* game is now paused during "Alt+Tab" 
* two new music tracks, two old ones axed (windows version) 
* you can now see which levels you have already finished 
* support for two gamepads 
* two player support on one keyboard 
* better profile page on the homepage 
* controls for the manual changed/optimized 
* highscore lists have been improved 
* ATI shadow bug fixed 

1.1.0 - 2017-12-27

* Crash with the HUD particles fixed
* New, improved highscore menu
* New info signs for the levels

1.0.0 - 2017-12-17

* 2 new music tracks for the game 
* New distortion effect at the start of a level 
* Improved mission menu 
* Manual and ending screen do now have a leet effect 
* The next level can now be played after the ending screen 
* Top level players are now shown at the ending screen 
* Various smaller fixes 

0.9.0 - 2017-11-25

* New music track
* 2 new transition effects
* The personal ranking in the olymp is now shown in the main menu

0.8.0 - 2017-11-19

* 2 new music tracks 
* New manual screen to explain the game 
* Fixes for the shadows 
* Regular expression for mail addresses fixed 
* New credits entries for the testers 

0.7.6 - 2017-11-12

* Various small bugs fixed 
* Crash fixed when there is no internet connection 
* Lights and shadows optimized 

0.7.5 - 2017-11-10 

* Loading screen for all database accesses implemented 
* Some new sound effects added 
* New particle effects added 
* There are now 8 levels instead of 4 
* New backgrounds added
